casebody.data:
JAWAD A. SHAH, M.D., PC, Integrated Hospital Specialists, PC, Insight Anesthesia, PLLC, and Sterling Anesthesia, PLLC, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157951
COA: 340370 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 23, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file a brief addressing the no-fault amendments and responding to the amicus brief of the Michigan Health & Hospital Association is GRANTED. The brief submitted on August 21, 2019, is accepted for filing.
